title: ./x.py build OSError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory
body:
Trying to build from source on Ubuntu 18.04 x64
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./x.py", line 11, in <module>
    bootstrap.main()
  File "/tmp/z/rust/src/bootstrap/bootstrap.py", line 866, in main
    bootstrap(help_triggered)
  File "/tmp/z/rust/src/bootstrap/bootstrap.py", line 834, in bootstrap
    build.download_stage0()
  File "/tmp/z/rust/src/bootstrap/bootstrap.py", line 355, in download_stage0
    self._download_stage0_helper(filename, pattern)
  File "/tmp/z/rust/src/bootstrap/bootstrap.py", line 390, in _download_stage0_helper
    get("{}/{}".format(url, filename), tarball, verbose=self.verbose)
  File "/tmp/z/rust/src/bootstrap/bootstrap.py", line 26, in get
    download(sha_path, sha_url, False, verbose)
  File "/tmp/z/rust/src/bootstrap/bootstrap.py", line 59, in download
    _download(path, url, probably_big, verbose, True)
  File "/tmp/z/rust/src/bootstrap/bootstrap.py", line 86, in _download
    exception=exception)
  File "/tmp/z/rust/src/bootstrap/bootstrap.py", line 136, in run
    ret = subprocess.Popen(args, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/subprocess.py", line 394, in __init__
    errread, errwrite)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/subprocess.py", line 1047, in _execute_child
    raise child_exception
OSError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory
```
`Python 2.7.15+ (default, Nov 27 2018, 23:36:35)`
